title: Pearl Izumi - Ride Men's Elite Thermal Long Sleeve Jersey
features: Three back pockets for storage; Reflective elements for low-light visibility
ELITE Thermal Fleece fabric provides superior insulation, moisture transfer, dry time and odor-resistance
Full-length internal draft flap with zipper garage seals in warmth; Silicone gripper on back to hold jersey in place while riding
description: Wear it alone on cool, mild days for cozy, unrestricted warmth, or pair it with a Barrier vest or shell for added protection in cold, wet weather. Made with ELITE Thermal Fleece for insulation and moisture transfer, this long-sleeve jersey is a great three season piece for fall, winter, or spring riding.
